blackhole.description: Indicates whether to drop traffic that matches this route (default to `false`).

destinationCidrBlock.description: IPv4 or IPv6 RFC1924 CIDR used for destination matches. Routing decisions are based on the most specific match.

transitGatewayAttachmentId.description: Identifier of EC2 Transit Gateway Attachment (required if `blackhole` is set to false).

transitGatewayRouteTableId.description: Identifier of EC2 Transit Gateway Route Table.

transitGatewayRouteTableId.description: Identifier of EC2 Transit Gateway Route Table.
